'''Howard Jones''' is a patient who is waiting for a heart transplant.

==History==
Howard was in the hospital waiting for a heart transplant. When one became available, Howard and his husband, Randall, were told he'd be getting the transplant that day. However, when [[Maggie Pierce]] went to retrieve the heart, she found it covered in hematomas, making it unsuitable for transplant. She had an intern tell Howard and his husband that he would be remaining on the list.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Randall Jones]]. Randall is very emotional and cried when he learned that Howard would be getting a heart transplant.
